page.title: 11Dowlais Police Station.
page.content: . Dowlais Police Station is a modern building set alongside a new housing estate.It is called a SECTION and is linked with the CENTRAL POLICE STATION MERTHYR TYDFIL two miles to the south. It has two floors.On the ground floor there is a general office,a charge room,a store room ,an inspection office and two cells.Upstairs there is a parade room,a store room,a rest room,a locker room and a canteen. Outside there is a car park,kennels for the two police dogs,garages and a room for stolen property. We were taken around the station by a very friendly Sergeant O'Keefe. He showed us the riot equipment used in the recent miner's strike.We tested the shields and helmets.They were very strong.Then we had our fingerprints taken.It was really interesting.
